verses.name: Matthew 26:35
verses.text: Peter said unto him, Though I should die with thee, yet will I not deny thee. Likewise also said all the disciples.

verses.name: Matthew 26:36
verses.text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane, and saith unto the disciples, Sit ye here, while I go and pray yonder.

verses.name: Matthew 26:37
verses.text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee, and began to be sorrowful and very heavy.

verses.name: Matthew 26:38
verses.text: Then saith he unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful, even unto death: tarry ye here, and watch with me.
